Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
I feel very secure on campus, we have a training facility for paramedics and security, and they will jump in to do what needs done.
Way to many to list! And they are awesome.
Great for all students. I love the diversity of OSU, they accept you for who you are and that is that!!!
The Hub has great food and a comfortable atmosphere to study or just hang out until your next class begins.
I love going to school here! I have yet to meet anyone that did not truly seem happy that I was there and would help me with anything I needed.
They offer many extra-curricular activities, as well as movie night. The school values your opinions regarding changes that need to be made.
Great food and an affordable price.
I did not live on the campus.
The science course are pretty intense, the general education courses are great to take on line.
If you know what your major is, make sure you tell the advisors so they can direct your classes each step if the way. They are extremely helpful.

If you are looking for a school that will help you get where you want to be, then this is the school. The cost for the courses are very affordable. And the academic advisors are top-notch and guide you every step of the way. Thank you OSU-OKC
